name: Mic Drop
description:
This was the game that me and my team made for the University of Portsmouth Game Jam 2018 where we managed to win the best overall game. We made this in 5 days and on Game Maker2.0

You need Xbox 360 controllers to play this, up to 4 players.

Welcome to Mic Drop! The main goal is to hold onto the mic until your points hit 0, if you get hit by other people's bullets or die then you lose the Mic!

You can only jump by shooting yourself up with the blunderbass.

Controls

Left stick: Move left or right

Right Stick: aim gun

Right trigger: Shoot

Y: swap guns

Menu:

A: Select map or character

Dpad: switch maps or characters

Start: Join game

Select: Move to Map screen

R (Keyboard): Restart
